ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the ultimate heavy metal crossover as the original shock rocker meets the original death metal comic book universe! Bizarre nightmares are plaguing Evil Ernie, Chastity and Purgatori, and though the hate each other's guts, they may have to join the teen monster team called The Chosen to find the one and only Alice Cooper!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Joyce Chin & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B/Auth | Blank Authentix Cover | None | 2 | C/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Joyce Chin | 3 | D/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Joyce Chin & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E/RE | Baltimore Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Photo | 5 | F/RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Photo | 6 |
